thread.title: Manafort pleads not guilty again; Lewandowski testifies

title: Manafort pleads not guilty again; Lewandowski testifies
text:
Manafort pleads not guilty again; Lewandowski testifies Thursday, March 08, 2018 - 01:42 
U.S. President Donald Trump’s former campaign chairman Paul Manafort again pleaded not guilty on Thursday to criminal charges in the investigation into alleged Russian meddling in the 2016 election. Meanwhile, Trump's ex-campaign manager Corey Lewandowski refused to answer some questions asked by the House of Representatives Intelligence Committee.
